title: Welcome to ITG
body:
Thanks for taking part in Into The Gridâ€™s pre-release!

We are eager to see the content you create with this version and to get your feedback.
Please remember that all content you create is subject to an embargo until Friday, November 7, 10AM CET.

We will continue updating the game until launch day, so please refer to the box below for more information about the current version.
